title: Quick-open file in $EDITOR
description:
Create an extension that opens a file via $EDITOR using a keyboard shortcut.
The filename is determined by:
1. Reference in the user's last prompt (explicit or implicit).
2. Last file touched by the agent in the previous turn's tool calls.

close_reason: Implemented permission-gate.ts in extensions/ based on the pi-mono example.

title: Bookmarks extension
description:
Create an extension to save the last assistant response as a bookmark:
- Local bookmarks folder: ~/backup/artifacts/bookmarks
- Trigger: Keyboard shortcut or slash command
- Action: Write last prompt output (assistant response) to a new .md file
- Filename format: YYYY-MM-DD-dynamic-bookmark-title.md
- Title: Dynamically generated in a concise way from the saved content

title: Beads extension
description:
Create an extension for task management using beads:
- list bd tasks (scrollable, priority sort)
- show task details
- edit task priority
